c1.name: Vigilant Sentinel
c1.descriptionRaw: After Illuga triggers a <color=#FFE699FF>Geo-related Reaction</color> on the field, he will regain 12 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered at most once every 15s.
c1.description: After Illuga triggers a Geo-related Reaction on the field, he will regain 12 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered at most once every 15s.

c2.name: Elk With Fanged Antlers
c2.descriptionRaw: When Elemental Burst {LINK#S11275}<color=#FFD780FF>Shadowless Reflection</color>{/LINK}'s Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect is active, for every 7 stacks of {LINK#N11270001}<color=#FFD780FF>Nightingale's Song</color>{/LINK} consumed, Illuga will summon Aedon, dealing a single instance of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> to 1 nearby opponent. The DMG dealt is based on 400% of Illuga's Elemental Mastery and 200% of his DEF. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
c2.description: When Elemental Burst **Shadowless Reflection**'s Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect is active, for every 7 stacks of **Nightingale's Song** consumed, Illuga will summon Aedon, dealing a single instance of Geo DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The DMG dealt is based on 400% of Illuga's Elemental Mastery and 200% of his DEF. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

c6.name: Nightmare Orioles
c6.descriptionRaw:
Enhances the Lightkeeper's Oath effect of the Ascension Talent <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#P1272101}Torchforger's Covenant{/LINK}</color>: For <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> dealt to opponents, CRIT Rate is increased by 10%, CRIT DMG is increased by 30%.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam:</color>
When characters are affected by Lightkeeper's Oath, Elemental Mastery is increased by 80.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "<color=#FFD780FF>Torchforger's Covenant</color>."
